DOC.brief_title: Treatment Patients With Idiopathic Membranous Nephropathy
DOC.detailed_description: Inclusion Criteria : - patient idiopathic membranous nephropathy - nephrotic syndrome - normal renal function ( serum creatinine [ Screat ] < 1.5 mg/dl ) - elevate urinary beta2-microglobulin IgG Immunosuppressive therapy consisting : - cyclophosphamide 1.5 mg/kg/day 12 month - prednisone orally , 0.5 mg/kg alternate day 6 month - i.v . methylprednisolone 1000 mg day 1,2,3 , 60,61,62 , 120,121,122 Study Groups : - early : immediate start immunosuppressive therapy time patient identify high-risk - late : start therapy deterioration renal function ( increase Screat > 25 % Screat > 1.5 mg/dl ) Main Outcome Parameters : - serum creatinine - remission proteinuria - period nephrotic proteinuria - major side effect : hospitalisation , infection
